title: Distributed Data Show Live Episode 150:  Is self driving data infrastructure our future? D
description:
As infrastructure engineers, we have plenty to do. Even with all the cool DevOps tooling out there helping us do more with less, we still have situations that demand our attention. Raghavendra Prabhu and Yelp has been working on this problem with their Kubernetes enabled tool, PaaSTA. Yelp is able to assemble stacks quickly to give developers the fast track to being productive. We have a great conversation about the future of Cassandra and Kubernetes and maybe you'll be convinced that the robot uprising may not be all bad.


CONNECT WITH DATASTAX
Subscribe: http://www.youtube.com/c/datastaxdevs?sub_confirmation=1 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/datastaxdevs
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/datastaxdevs

ABOUT DATASTAX DEVELOPERS
On the DataStax Developers YouTube channel, you can find tutorials, workshops and much more to help you learn and stay updated with the latest information on Apache CassandraÂ©.  Create an account on https://academy.datastax.com to watch our free online courses, tutorials, and more.
